body_html: I think I'm first going to try putting both of the individual github avatars of the students next to each other, so no fuzz for the user. In case we want to upgrade this with upload-/fusing-goodies client-side, we can do that later! waddoyousay?

body: I think I'm first going to try putting both of the individual github avatars of the students next to each other, so no fuzz for the user. In case we want to upgrade this with upload-/fusing-goodies client-side, we can do that later! waddoyousay?
